title: Send Webflow form data to Google Sheets
author: Giovanni Ruggieri
workflow_json:
{"nodes":[{"id":"096a8e0c-8f72-40fb-aa1e-118fb33a3916","name":"Prepare Fields","type":"n8n-nodes-base.code","position":[1740,860],"parameters":{"jsCode":"const formData = $input.all()[0].json.payload.data
const Date = $input.all()[0].json.payload.submittedAt || new Date()

return {
  ...formData, // creates a new field for every element inside formData
  Date
}

Note4","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[260,160],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":520,"height":1680,"content":"## Self-hosted N8N users only:

### How to get Client ID and Client Secret

- From your Webflow dashboard go to "Apps & Integrations"
![](https://imgur.com/IX2ruVB.png)

- Look for "App development" and click "Create an App"
![](https://imgur.com/J0be6lz.png)

- Fill the fields and click "Continue"
![](https://imgur.com/Uiwo7vp.png)

- Inside "Building blocks" enable REST API, insert your "Redirect URL" from N8N, enable form access and click "Create App"
![](https://imgur.com/lf8Xv7R.png)
![](https://imgur.com/5yyex2U.png)

- Copy and paste Client ID and Client Secret to N8N and connect

readme:
## Send Webflow form data to Google Sheets üöÄ

### How It Works

This workflow connects your Webflow form submissions to Google Sheets with **style and efficiency**. Here's the magic in action:

  1. **Form Submitted** üéâ ‚Äì A Webflow form submission triggers the flow.
  2. **Fields Prepared** üõ†Ô∏è ‚Äì Data gets organized, and a submission date is added.
  3. **Data Logged** üìã ‚Äì Your data finds a cozy new home in Google Sheets.



* * *

### Set-Up Steps

‚è±Ô∏è **Estimated Time:** 5-10 minutes

  1. **Connect Webflow** üåê ‚Äì Hook up your Webflow account and disable legacy APIs (instructions inside the workflow).
  2. **Set Up Google Sheets** üßæ ‚Äì Choose your spreadsheet and authenticate.
  3. **You're Ready!** üí´ ‚Äì Let the workflow take it from here.



* * *

### Why You'll Love It ‚ù§Ô∏è

  * **No More Manual Copy-Paste:** Save time and keep data clean.
  * **Smart Field Mapping:** Automatically creates columns and fits your data.
  * **Helpful Notes Along the Way:** Friendly tips guide you through setup like a pro.



* * *

Enjoy the smooth ride from Webflow to Google Sheets! üöÄ
